website_summaries.verdict: Well-reinforced flexible walls and unique labeling system. Quality construction with leak-proof features and easy filling.
pros: Bottles feature turn-dial labeling system that displays content label upon twisting
Suction cups make it easy to use in hotel bathrooms and frees up counter and shower space
cons: Rare instances of leakage have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Pilots dream
customer_reviews.text: I am a pilot and I always had problems with my travel size bottles leaking with the multiple changes in cabin pressure. I have used my LiquiSnugs on 4 flights now and have not had a leak. The silicone bottles make it so easy to dispense my shampoo, body soap and lotion. Excellent product!!!😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Jehu Croft

customer_reviews.title: "Guaranteed Leak Proof?"
customer_reviews.text: One of these "Guaranteed Leak Proof" containers leaked badly on the first trip I took it on. It happened to be on an international flight and when I arrived and opened my kit for inspection at the airport, it had made a real mess of things! Just to be clear, I had carefully followed the instructions on adding the liquid and tightening the lid. Returned the product for refund.
customer_reviews.author: AllWellHouse

customer_reviews.title: Get your products through TSA
customer_reviews.text: These little bottles work great for shampoo, conditioner, lotion, etc. They are TSA compliant, so you can put them into a carry-on bag and get through security without a problem. So far there are no leaks. And the silicone outside means they can expand and contract due to air pressure without bursting open. Even after opening the top, the bottle requires a gentle squeeze to get any liquid past the opening - so you almost never have spills even when they are opened.
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: Interesting design and seems leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I needed shampoo and soap dispensers for my gym bag that I leave in my car and toss around. I had couple others that came with by Ogio locker bag, but they have leaked on me several times. These are cute, but their design has a plastic tube that keeps the liquid from contacting the tops screw on threads - I thought it was pretty innovative. Looks like it can't leak unless you step on it. Would have give the dispense 5 stars too, but its a could use a bigger thumb slot or lever in the top opener. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Solution for Bringing Your Own Toiletries
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for two years now and travel about 50% of the time for work. They are still working as well as when they were new. Based on the design, the one thing I would usually have concern about is the lid hinge, but that's not a concern at all. It has held up just fine. They are easy to fill and have never leaked in my bag. Sometimes I carry on, sometimes they are below the plane. I have dropped them numerous times. They still work great. They also dispense the shampoo and shower gel with ease. I even used my small tube for a facewash, which worked well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice!  And Customer Service is superior..!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles. They're great for traveling as they're leak proof. You can easily see how much product is inside as they're translucent. You can also change the label by rotating the cap to match the contents. i.e. shampoo, conditioner, soap, sun . etc... I like that they feel strong, yet they're easy to squeeze so you don't waste anything like you do in the stiffer plastic bottles. I've ordered several sets and will be using them for lots of things including for portable lunch bag condiments. TIP: (If you're flying, don't fill them all the way up to the top as the pressure may expand them)
customer_reviews.author: HCA fussy one

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended , great product.
customer_reviews.text: Why did I go through 20 years of business travel with cheap hard plastic containers from Walgreens? They would open up almost every trip so I always just kept them in a tightly sealed ziplock bag and washed them off when I got to the destination or home. I randomly was reading an article on Wirecutter about best travel shampoo containers and found these. Only one trip down so far but they worked perfectly. Nothing opened up, the pour is very controlled and the changeable labels are brilliant. My only complaint is they don't sell these individually or in packs of 4. I need 4 so will need to buy another 3 pack. Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Desai

customer_reviews.title: These things are great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and simple to fill. They didn't leak in my carry-on luggage that I had to gate check because they ran out of space. The suction cups are a nice feature. They dispense very easily; almost too easily. The first time I tried dispensing some lotion, I got a lot more than I needed. At least now I know how much force is necessary to dispense. Neat little bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: First leak-free travel I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I carried jojoba oil in one of these containers on a long trip with multiple flights and there was not a single leak -- I've never had that happen with any other travel bottle. Only thing to note is a thinner liquid like oil can come out really fast b/c you can't get it out without squeezing the bottle -- but I got the hang of it! Also thicker liquids can be hard to get the last bits out without taking off the lid, but a small price to pay for having zero leaks in my toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cello Bella

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many travel bottles, but I have to say these are my favorite. The silicone bottles are very high quality, as are the lids and suction holders. Very pleased. Only minor complaint is that the lettering could be in a higher contrast font color. I wear glasses and these labels are difficult to see without them.
customer_reviews.author: CPT_Walt

customer_reviews.title: A Traveler’s Must
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Europe after my first trip to Europe resulted in exploded shampoos and face wash in my toiletry bag. These are a travel necessity, even if you’re going away for a weekend. I love the suction cup on the back of them - it makes showering simple and allows the bottles to dry more efficiently. The bottles rinse out well (I put mine in the dishwasher). The label windows are a nice feature, but can be a little difficult to mauever. While traveling, I saw several similar products, but personally, the LiquiSnugs looked and felt like the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping / week+ long Bug Out Bags
customer_reviews.text: Great for Shampoo, body wash, toothpaste, condiments. They are large enough to give an ample supply of any semi fluid. They stay sealed, and the identifiers are nice if you are in fact using them for bath products. The rubber is thick, doesnt leak, and they have a removable inner lining at the cap i suppose to help prevent leaks. Im not sure if thats its purpose, but it seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: These are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I traveled a lot that past two years and I went through so many travel containers. I saw these and got them hoping they wouldn’t leak and would last longer than the stupid cheap ones I would buy from Target. These are awesome! They don’t leak and they suction to the wall or glass if you don’t have much room. I highly recommended these. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve had my nice shampoo or conditioner leak on my stuff and make a mess. No more wasted money. Think about all the money you spend buying cheap replacement bottles, replacing toiletry bags and whatever else gets ruined from the leaks... That all adds up!
customer_reviews.author: Louy816

customer_reviews.title: These containers work great! The material is durable and I didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: These containers work great! The material is durable and I didn't have any leaks. I like that they are flexible as compared to the hard plastic ones that can make it difficult to squeeze out product. The two extra "features" on these containers that I didn't care for are the suction cups and twist labels. Overall these are great for travel/carry-on luggage if you're needing containers that don't leak and allow you to actually get the product out when using.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: If you travel, you need these!
customer_reviews.text: I have needed something like this for quite a while, but kept putting off buying something. I travel regularly for work and travel size bottles of products are very expensive. I bought these because they have suction cups and built in labels. After using them one time, I’m sold. The suction cups keep them from falling off the soap shelves in the shower, they’re easy to fill, don’t leak, and are easy to use. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: IN

customer_reviews.title: Super "Snugs"  - ZERO leaks!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY - These are100% leak-proof. I've been trying them out at home to ensure that's the case, and it is! Also wanted to see how long one bottle would last. For me: One of the larger bottles is good for 7 days of liquid body wash (with a poof scrubber that generates loads of bubbles) and the smaller one holds 7 days of shampoo. (I have short hair, so only need single shampoo "cycle" every day!) I've used other well known brands and not had the luck as these provide. If you're looking around; stop here. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Hooked on Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well designed
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use these containers yet, but I was so impressed with the design itself that I had to write a review. Each bottle has a collar, through which you can see a label for the contents of the container. The collar allows you to select Shampoo, Conditioner, Soap, or Suntan Lotion. To select the label, you have to remove a collar, which is inserted into the neck, and then pull the cap from the bottle, exposing the ability to select the proper label. Looking at the design, it's hard to see how these bottles could leak, or could fail for that matter. I think you'll be very, very pleased with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford J. Musante

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I was having terrible problems with my liquids while traveling previously--guaranteed to leak! I had some budget bottles I had bought from CVS, which I had to put in baggies to travel. The LiquiSnugs were a clear upgrade (while costing a bit more, of course). I filled them with liquids and gels the day after they arrived, and that weekend took a flight out of town. My dopp kit was bone dry, so I was very happy. The only issue is dispensing liquids. If you want a couple of drops at a time, these may not be your solution, but for shampoo and squirting mouthwash, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Travel Leaks!  Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo, conditioner and face wash made it to and through Europe with no leaks! Flight time 14 hours each way. Very Comfortable grip, Easy to squeeze and can use to empty (product doesn’t get stuck). Larger sizes enough for shampoo/conditioner for 12 day trip. Thought labels not needed but proved to be very handy as I did forget which color was which product. Suction cups however not dependable, and will fall off eventuallly in shower or above sink. Better to store in shower caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer💫

customer_reviews.title: Really travel-handy
customer_reviews.text: I have been traveling with these little guys now for several weeks and am really impressed with them. They do *not* leak, just as advertised. They are cleverly engineered and seem to be well-made. And I was skeptical of the little suction cups on them, but discovered that they work reasonably well on non-porous walls. I use them for body wash, and in showers that are stintingly supplied with holders for soap etc. they are really handy. I liked them so much that I bought another set for my son.
customer_reviews.author: FLosopher

customer_reviews.title: I loved loved loved these
customer_reviews.text: I loved loved loved these!!! They were perfect for my carry on and not a single one leaked. I do wish they were slightly bigger, three of the same size would have been more helpful, but I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Quilts2theHilt

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles and definitely no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: These little bottles have jaunted around Europe in my backpack (i.e. getting smashed and jostled at every possible opportunity) and have yet to leak. I love them so much, and I would definitely recommend them to anyone I know. Now that I'm back from jet-setting, they will be going in my gym bag, because my last set of bottles definitely aren't up to surviving the beating my gym bag goes through daily!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken these anywhere, but I put shaving cream in one and as it expanded it didn't leak. That was impressive. I'm sure they'll do well on the plane! I got these so that I could do carry on only. The material is soft and very pliable. The only downside I see with them is that there is a hard plastic piece inside the neck that you have to remove to easily change the label. I'm probably not going to use that anyway, so it doesn't affect the rating for me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: These container, as others have noted, do in fact leak
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for transporting air, but use caution when using for liquids; fortunately, TSA requires zip lock bags for liquids; the bags, by the way, are pretty reliably non-leaking, so the contents of the tubes may be contained if you're lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Kugelmass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and use.  Fool proof.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a few days but have tried them at home and no problems so far. I compared these to other brand and these have a sleeve that fits in the opening to keep the silicone in place so it can't pinch or slide out. The suction cups only hold while they are wet so will not stay after you leave the shower but they bounced instead of breaking and didn't leak even though they fell off the shower wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Between Threads and Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted something that was sure not to leak through my connections and international flight. They didn’t even make it through one checkpoint before I found body wash all over the other belongings. The lid wasn’t open and it was threaded on tightly, but the bottle still leaked around the threads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat product with a couple of fundamental design shortcomings.
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are molded out of Silicone rubber, which is gas permeable. That means that if you plan to store anything in these for longer than a week or so, it will start to dry out and thicken. Tried using these for hand sanitizer and a lot of the alcohol evaporated away after about a month, leaving a thick sticky gel. The other hiccup is the drip free valve. It only squirts out contents when you give the bottle a good squeeze, which then squirts out a sizable portion. If you're looking to only dispense a small amount, you're out of luck, unless you're willing to cut the valve out of the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Euge

customer_reviews.title: You do have to squeeze pretty hard if the fluid is thick
customer_reviews.text: Wow, truly leak proof! We've tried several others who claimed to be leak proof, but these actually performed. We always put liquid bottles in a zip-lock bag because they always leak a little. These did not. You do have to squeeze pretty hard if the fluid is thick, but dispensing is easy to control. The shape is a little odd, but we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dee NTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for New Dopp Kit
customer_reviews.text: These fit into my bag like a glove! They are excellent for my shampoo and lotion (the small one yet to be filled!), and are very convenient to use. After changing the labels in these I can tell they’ll be leak-proof in the bag. The silicon should hold up to everyday usage...time will tell! Excellent for travel so I can’t wait for another trip to my sister’s! Great product, and I heartily endorse it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They feel good in the hand and are the perfect size when traveling. Lord knows that I can't take full bottles of shampoo, conditioner etc when traveling somewhere. They are huge, bulky, heavy and I only need a small portion of the contents. These were perfect. They pack well, don't leak, can be suction cupped to the tile shower wall and are just so convenient overall. Well built and I like that you can change the name of what's inside with a "twist". Buy them and I think you'll agree that they are just what you need.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are great! Easy to fill, quality materials and the built in labeling is a plus. The only problem I had is that they are bigger than the bottles I used to carry and therefore, I had difficulty getting all of my liquids into the quart-sized bag but that's something I adapted to by using small jars for things like night cream and make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: I bought the gotoob and these are way better. First of all
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gotoob and these are way better. First of all, these have the "thing" to stick on the wall and the label is silver so you can see (if its shampoo, or soap etc) more clearly. These are a good buy, good quality and excellent for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Xasha

customer_reviews.title: Better than grocery store travel containers, but still not great
customer_reviews.text: Despite the "100% guarantee leak proof" claim, one out of the three of these bottles leaked all over my bag. Luckily I'd put them all into a ziplock before packing them, otherwise it's contents would have spilled all over all of my luggage. The two that didn't leak seem to be of good quality and are easy to use. The suction cups on the sides are a nice thought, but don't work if the bottle is over half full. Better than grocery store travel containers, but still not great.
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product without any leakage!
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to Europe and back without any leaking of liquids! Filled one 3/4 full and was enough shampoo for 11 days with a small extra amount left over. Super convenient in shower in hotel and stuck to marble wall without falling off! My daughter who continues to travel abroad liked hers so much she asked me to leave my extra one with her! Great product and recommend for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Karelija

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Bottles I’ve Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: The best travel bottles I have ever used because of how soft they are. Having said that the valves also release a lot of product if you squeeze a little too hard, but by the same token, it’s easy to suck the product back in. Super easy to fill, and the label adjuster is easy once you figure out how (or read the instructions!)
customer_reviews.author: Tisha C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: No leakage - very easy to clean. We put salmon oil in our dogs food and couldn't take the whole bottle with us while we traveled. We thought for sure it would leak - I mean it's oil but no - zero leakage and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hand sanitizer, but no leaks
customer_reviews.text: These are great for shampoo & conditioner, but not for lower viscosity (thinner) stuff like hand sanitizer. In order to get the bottle dispense the thinner liquid, it takes too much pressure to overcome the opening. So it ends up "spurting" out all over the place. =( However, even with the thinner liquid hand sanitizer, the bottle does not leak. =)
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a little
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a one week trip to Costa Rica, and the product is great. Nice and cute, the jelly material is soft, and it is very good quality. Only thing is that the cap on the little one doesn't close quite right and leaks a little. I put mine in a ziploc bag anyway and even though it leaked my soap still lasted me the entire trip so it was very minor. I think it might have just been my luck. Overall very good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I travel almost every week and this is one of the best products I've ever purchased for travel. They don't leak, they are easy to fill and easy to pack. You won't go wrong with this product. I love the sizes and the way you can mark what is in each one. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Mixon

customer_reviews.title: Updating my review
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review. I received a response from the company that was very positive. I applaud them for reaching out so quickly and positively. Nice work folks! Wish I could return these travel bottles but past deadline. Just used the smaller bottle on a trip. Put facial moisturizer in it. Every time I tried to squeeze out a small amount, a huge amount would gush out into my hand. Happened every time.
customer_reviews.author: PS Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect complement to my gym experience
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much I ordered another set. They’re perfect for packing all your toiletries for travel or for showers at the gym. You can easily control the amount of shampoo, lotion, shaving cream, etc. that comes out with a light squeeze. I’m pretty rough with my dopp kit and I’ve had zero leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and use
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these bottles. I like the material used and that you can get product into and out of bottles with ease. I have trouble getting the “product type” indicator to stay in place when using. Maybe it’s just me, but the identifier moves in use. Otherwise, very helpful product.
customer_reviews.author: Isobel

customer_reviews.title: Great leak proof bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving these bottles! I travel for work constantly and I like to use baby oil for eye makeup removal. It makes a HUGE mess! I double/triple ziploc it, which is such a waste of plastic. These bottles are trace champs! I’ve already had a successful flight with baby oil & not a speck on my Dopp kit. Suh-weet!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in hands, and these looked convenient and simple. However, when it came, the instructions for setting the label to identify the contents was complicated, multistep, and I was unable to do it. Even the cap which pops up to dispense was tight. Maybe this is good for sealing, but I couldn't use this and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Like the feel and size of these
customer_reviews.text: Like the feel and size of these. They are not cheap or flimsy feeling. The necks have the labels already in place and you just turn it to show what product is inside.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof? YES! Easy to fill & Dispense? YES! Labelled? YES!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like an idiot for buying the ridiculously bad 99 cent bottles at the box store for so many years. These are SOOO much better! They don't leak, they are simple to fill w/no mess, product comes out without having to work at it, and they are nicely labeled. They even have suction cups on the side to stick to the shower, which comes in handy on cruises.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bottle
customer_reviews.text: These were worth every penny. I use them all the time and they have never leaked in over a year, are incredibly easy to refill (60 seconds to refill all three), and they breeze through TSA no problem. They also suction to the wall pretty well so they don’t have to sit on the shelf in the hotel shower. Or worse yet the bottom of the shower floor. Ick.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these for one trip. I am very pleased with them, they were easy to fill, easy to open and close and did not leak at all. I used them 1 for shampoo, 1 conditioner and 1 lotion. My only negative, and it really is just preference, is I would like some more to be able to purchase just the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Imescaping

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Everywhere (plane travel)
customer_reviews.text: Used exactly as directed. 2 out of 3 leaked all products out into my bags during flight. Complete disaster. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: tangodancer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I just took my first trip with these bad boys and they did everything I wanted them to: 1) not leak all over my stuff 2) not be questioned by TSA for being too big And they did so much more than my old bottles: 1) The rings made it easy to identify what was in each bottle. I use a lot of natural products which all look the same. 2) suction cups made it easy to place in shower. In short, buy them and never think of what bottles you travel with again because these just work and they work well!
customer_reviews.author: John Rosenswagger

customer_reviews.title: Best for Travel
customer_reviews.text: These travel bottles are the best I've had the pleasure of using. My boyfriend and I took them on a trip to the Grand Canyon, where it was 100 degrees F for 3 days in a row. The elevation usually causes all sorts of leakage and I was sure the heat was going to destroy them. Nope! They powered through! I recommended them to everyone and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can change the name of the contents
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these, I bought them with the intention of filling one with an oil. So when I saw that they were made with a food safe silicone I was sold. I love that you can change the name of the contents, without writing on the bottle or trying to peel off a label from previous contents. Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found containers that are easy to dispense while still being leak proof. These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina girl

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: These little containers are great! I travel a lot and these are the best. Easy to fill, easy to squeeze the product out and no leaks!!
customer_reviews.author: Tippy Toes

customer_reviews.title: These are worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!!! They don't leak and they're perfect for my carry in luggage. I love the fact they have built in labels because I always get my shampoo and conditioner mixed up. Also like the suction cup that allows you to stick them on the tile wall or shower door. Customer service is awesome as well! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: 3+ they didn’t leak, but I had hair styling oily stuff in one. When I got to my destination and opened the container to use the product inside, it was empty! It took me a few minutes to realize my hair product was not compatible with silicone and got completely absorbed into the container! I had to toss that one out.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for travel. Very cool design, and true to their name through many flights they did not leak once. I've had cheaper travel bottles that I always regret, but these were built to last. The only downside is they are a little pricey. Well worth the investment if you travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a trip!
customer_reviews.text: I brought these on a trip when flying and they worked great. They didn't spill and are made of quality silicone. Nice you can turn the dial to label each one but would be better if it was easier to do. Worth getting if traveling.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Spared from clean up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bottles because I was going on a trip and the previous plastic bottle that i used to pack with leaked and created messy clean up. I am on the first plane trip now using the bottles and have had no problem with the bottles leaking. I like the feel and size of the bottles. The suction cup is a nice addition. These are a good purchase for travel.
customer_reviews.author: wenda

customer_reviews.title: These have been excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: After having the head snap off another travel container while in Amsterdam (a gooey mess in my bag) I decided to upgrade. These have been excellent so far. No leaks and very well made. Great for travel and the gym. The built in labels are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: B Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Love the Suction Cups
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups are great and they work! You can just stick these up in the shower if you don't have a shelf and it's perfect. They don't leak, they are very durable and they are clear so you can see what is in them. It's a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel. No leaks, even after flying.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well, and do not leak even after pressure changes (e.g. flying). They're easy to fill, and the suction cup is a nice touch for sticking it to the shower tile while sudsing up.
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: These actually worked - no leaks
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely worked to not leak shampoo or conditioner across multiple flights and altitudes. I've had packing disasters with some that looked similar so I was a little skeptical but the reviews were correct. These do the job. Not a drop leaked, and very easy to dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best travel containers ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are, by far, the best travel containers I have ever used!!! They really are leakproof and super comfortable to squeeze. And the face that they have suction cups on them so you can just stick them on the wall... genius! I just cleaned out my sets to fill for vacation! They are def worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic bottles for traveling. Took them on a trip to Chicago and they held up perfectly with no leaks! They are easy to fill, easy dispensing, and they have these great little changeable labels to show what’s in each one. I plan to buy another set. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Missing inner ring on one of the 3 containers.  UPDATED: Company replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Missing inner ring on one of the 3 containers. UPDATED: Company replaced faulty item free of charge, so I'm now satisfied with this product. Doesn't appear to leak. Only thing I would say is, these containers are on the heavier side weight-wise for their size.
customer_reviews.author: SKH

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Brought them to the gym with me the first time today and really wish I had known about this product before I purchased the inexpensive plastic bottles from IKEA! These little bottles are very well made (feels really good when you hold them in your hand) and easy to fill up. Each squirt is the right amount. Absolutely satistifed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P Chen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect sizes and you can definitely tell that they are durable. My only complaint (and it is a small one) is that the dials to change the "type" of product in them is a little hard to turn. Something that I can live with but thought other buyers should know! We will definitely be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: JediJenn

customer_reviews.title: They are not that easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not leak, but getting the stuff out was not good. They are too rubbery and the openings are not great. I went back to the normal traveling bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell.... poor design
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use for rice vinegar... they started stinking! Smelled up my whole office.... coworkers complained and I had to get rid of them.... threw them in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Russell W. Gordy

customer_reviews.title: Great travel containers
customer_reviews.text: Traveled with these within a week of receiving them and they were very nice. Easy to use and no leaks. I like how flexible they are when you squeeze them which allows the product to come out so easy. Would definitely like to purchase more, but it would be nice to have different size options to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: INC

customer_reviews.title: LiquiSnugs
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are a good design and are great for travel. I packed them but ended up using the soaps and shampoos at the hotels. Oh well. Still would recommend to those who don’t like using hotel stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carryon
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are good quality and dont leak at all. I put body wash, feminine wash, and face wash in the three I bought. I hadn't realized that one of them is smaller than the other two when I purchased, but it actually worked out because I like the smaller size for my face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bottles! I had an issue with the seal on the smallest bottle. I contacted LiquiSnugs directly, as requested, and they immediately took care of the problem. Very easy to work with. I haven't taken them on an airplane yet, but I expect they will be fine. If not, I have every confidence that customer service will take care of it!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Strait

customer_reviews.title: Truly Leak Proof Travel Bottles
customer_reviews.text: For my fellow Costco and BJ's shoppers, we all know that anything we purchase from these stores is far from travel size. There were a few things that I wanted to bring along on a recent vacation, but large bottles were not an option. I came across these bottles on Amazon and decided to give them a try. They worked perfectly - not a drop leaked from any bottle, even through multiple flights. I highly recommend these bottles and will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Romance Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Exactly what I was looking for. They're easy to fill and the one way dispense valve is nice to prevent leaks. Easy to squeeze and no more shaking and waiting for the last bit of liquid to come out.
customer_reviews.author: DaRedBull

customer_reviews.title: To insert or not?
customer_reviews.text: I love these things but they come with an insert inside the neck of the bottle. There are no instructions about retaining this insert. I tested these with food color and the only way to get one of them to seal was to remove the insert. Now I have good hand strength and after removing the insert and screwing the cap down I squeezed the crap out of that bottle and it did not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discolors over time
customer_reviews.text: They mostly don't leak, that's the good news. The bad news is I had some soap in them that had a brownish color to it, and the walls of the containers turned a nasty yellow color. Which was gross, so I tossed them. And then I bought another set, because they mostly don't leak. Therefore, three stars.
customer_reviews.author: olafurson

customer_reviews.title: Truly leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bottles and absolutely leak proof thus far. I'm using them for apple cider vinegar and olive oil as condiments for healthier food options when dining out, and not one spill or leak yet. Easy to clean, also. Very pleased and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I had some trouble trying to change the labels but I read another individuals review who had instructions and figured it out. The only thing that I found doesn’t work is the suction to the shower. I’ve tried it a few times in different showers and it always falls. But, it doesn’t leak in my luggage so I call it a win.
customer_reviews.author: katherine tabor

customer_reviews.title: Not flying friendly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and tested them with water as directed and they seemed to work, but after my first traveling experience with them in the air and they leaked the contents inside of them. Good thing I had them in ziploc baggies as I was skeptical from the beginning. Not leak proof
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: they are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They work, they are easy to use, and they did not leak when I used them. Silicone is much easier to clean than the hard plastic bottles. My only complaint is the company emailing me again and again begging for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I like the suction cup on the side and the slightly larger size.
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup allows the bottle to be stuck to the shower wall so you are not fumbling around a bunch of other product bottles while showering. It also holds a bit more than those stiffer little bottles. Getting three in a pack is nice, one for shampoo, one for conditioner and another for lotion.
customer_reviews.author: aherpa

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Completely unlike the 3 oz standard container that you can buy at a drugstore. You can actually picture your luggage getting manhandled and these things surviving!
customer_reviews.author: G. Yerrall

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully. No more peeking tentatively into your shaving kit to see if your shampoo exploded again during the flight. These things are truly awesome!
customer_reviews.author: thom flora

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, they don't leak
customer_reviews.text: These really work good for the gym. I needed something to put shampoo, conditioner and skin oil in. What I like best about them is that they don't leak at all, and the little built in suction cups make them super handy in the shower. Lastly, there's a short list of labels that can be selected by twisting the cap around the bottle part. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: HotelZulu

customer_reviews.title: Love it ... eco product too!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bottles. I was quite surprised they didn't leak... easy to use... suction cups don't seem to work though (maybe it's me).... I like them a lot! Would definitely recommend and I will buy again, next time I'm needing something like that in the future. Nice eco product too! I love that!!!
customer_reviews.author: EagleSpirit

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and I got tired of TSA trashing my lotions , facial wash and oils. Found this on Amazon and I love it. I am able to fit enough products in it to last me for days. I love it, I also carry the smaller size in my purse sometimes when I am going out and I cannot fit my hand lotion in my purse. This is a must buy. I usually feel too lazy to write reviews however I am so happy with this travel bottles, I just have to share the good news.
customer_reviews.author: Dunni A

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Needed new containers to take with me on a flight. I really liked that these ones were flexible, and seemed to simulate using an actual soap or shampoo bottle more than the average container. Overall, no complaints, got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: N. Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Work great. However, if the liquid you have in there is thin, it is not easy to control how much comes out (overshoots). Suction cups are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Compact, leakproof, great for small trips
customer_reviews.text: Super containers. I like how one can change contents on label. These work well for TSA guidlines and for traveling with enough contents to last a few days. Very happy with these and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zenzi Zang

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey but work
customer_reviews.text: So easy to pour what you need to in these and so far do not leak which is a HUGE bonus. Wish they were cheaper because they’re a little too pricey for only three of these.
customer_reviews.author: TBEAR91

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, but suction cups doesn’t hold
customer_reviews.text: No leaks. Suctions cups are a great feature but they need to be bigger as the current ones do not hold very long. Also, why are the labels in silver/gray? They are hard to read. These need to be in black and in bigger font. Lastly, the cap opening should end up on the opposite side of the suction cup, so when they are hanging, it would be easier to dispense the contents. The label should be on this side too.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: They don't leak
customer_reviews.text: These work as advertised. They haven't leaked after weeks of travelling and changing hotels every two to three days. The spinning ring that displays the contents (shampoo, soap, etc) is a little hard to spin but that really isn't an issue. I would recommend these to any one- especially frequent travelerls
customer_reviews.author: Bradford M Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lean proof
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed using these travel bottles. They work great, don’t leak, and especially helpful when a campground showers doesn’t have any shelves, so you just stick them to the wall. Great design and features. Only wish you could buy them individually, as I’d love to have a 3rd of the larger bottle without having to buy a new set. Then again, I’m sure I’ll find a use for the other bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer service, quality product
customer_reviews.text: They worked great! My only complaint is the suction cups on the back are a little small. You need a perfectly smooth and (ideally) dry surface for them to stick. Otherwise, they slowly slide down the shower wall until falling off. One of mine broke like this. Luckily, they have excellent customer service, and they sent me a whole new set, no questions asked. Hard to beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Hard to dispense but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: No leaks... but hard to dispense creams or thicker liquids. Practically had to bend bottles in half. Soft and curable containers though.
customer_reviews.author: DRE

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit more expensive than similar items found on this website but the leakproof guarantee is worth it. I took these on a month long traveling trip on multiple planes, a train, and boats, and didn't have a single spill. When you're running out of product it is hard to get the last few uses out but you just gotta squeeze and be okay with not getting 100%. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sharf

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t stick well to some surfaces and dropped so the lid didn’t hold up. However, I contacted the company and they were great to work with and I’m very happy. These are a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: tbench

customer_reviews.title: Used them on a trip. Traveled on an airplane ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them on a trip. Traveled on an airplane. No issues. Only complaint was that I had hard time turning the selectors for product.
customer_reviews.author: MC

product_meta.title: LiquiSnugs - 100% Guaranteed Leak Proof - Silicone Travel Bottles (3 PACK) TSA Approved - by TravelSnugs
feature_bullets: 100% LEAK-PROOF GUARANTEED: We have worked hard to modify these refillable travel containers and tested the heck out of them to ensure they don’t leak! We are so confident in our leak proof travel bottles that we will give you a FULL refund if you have ANY problems with them.

DIFFERENT SIZES: We think a set of two 3oz bottles and one 2oz bottle gives you the perfect combination to maximise use of your limited packing space. But if you disagree, let us know and if there are enough of you, we’ll adjust our next batch and let you know as soon as they are ready.

ADJUSTABLE LABELS & SUCTION PADS: Is your shampoo and body wash the same color? No problem - our adjustable labels will stop any confusion. And we know that a life on the move means showers aren’t always spacious and convenient; so that’s why we have the suction pads on there – you can always keep these accessories in easy reach.
BPA-FREE TRAVEL BOTTLE KIT: Made from food-grade, BPA-free silicone, you can fill these with condiments, sauces, or any liquid you like.

TRANSPORTATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION (TSA) – APPROVED: Taking these in your carry-on baggage? No problem - all of our LiquiSnugs silicon travel bottles are see-thru, and well under the 3.5 ounce / 100 ml restriction for taking onto all airline planes.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
